name: The Shore at Katathani

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the best holiday ever at The Shore, everything was perfect. Villa was fab, stylish with all the mod cons and we had the best view of the ocean. The sunken outdoor seating by our pool was great for relaxing and reading the paper. Loved the beach and easy access to local life at Kata Centre - great shopping! A big thank you to all the staff, they really made out stay memorable, so friendly.
reviews.title: Amazing resort, best holiday I've ever had!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 5 nights at The Shore. We had a villa on the top of the hill with an extraordinary view, covering a wide angle and far reaching area. Service was very, very friendly, even during heavy rain. Despite this heavy rain showers, transportation never failed (except when the battery of the cart was low and yes, you need the buggy service, it can be quite steep and a long way). The Shore is part of the large Katathani Resort with access to all the facilities (and restaurants - Fisherman's Wharf and the Thai restaurants are very good).
reviews.title: What a view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: The villas were new, spacious and well equipped; enough space and nice covered outside balcony to protect for bad weather. The pool of the villa was not large but fun because of the view. Since the hotel was at a stage of soft opening, construction was still ongoing but never disturbed and did not cause any noise. The beach during our visit was only accessible through the Katathani Resort and not directly from the hotel. Also the restaurant of The Shore was rather small (which cases sometimes problems at breakfast) but counts with a very nice view over the beach, particularly for a drink in the evening.
reviews.title: Not even close to a 5 star hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall we enjoyed our stay very much; very friendly, customer oriented and efficient service, quiet location and big, well equipped rooms - would definitively return. We had a good feeling about the villas.
reviews.title: Good Food, Good View, Good Room
So many "F" words - Fantastic, Fabulous, Friendly, Fine Food...
reviews.text: Alright- let me start by saying that I travel all the time, and know that 5 stars means something different in every country. However- when you're charging the prices that The Shore is, you have GOT to make sure that at least the basics are on par with what most travelers expect. The Shore doesnt even come close to measuring up to a true 5 star hotel. When I (tried) to check in, they said I didn't have a reservation. Get this- after accusing me of not having a reservation (I spelled out the name the reservation was under at least 6 times- but still nothing) they actually had me come around and use their computers to print out my confirmation page! As if this wasn't appauling enough, after I'd done their job for them, they then showed me to my room- which was a "Sea View" room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I just spent 4 nights at The Shore. We were stunned by the room, the view of the bay, and the integral private infinity pool. But what was also amazing was the service. The staff were all wonderful, and couldn't have been more helpful and friendly. It was the rainy season in Phuket so we had a day of rain, but that didn't stop us using our pool, or the bar/restaurant. Breakfast was served in the room, and was fantastic - lots of choice, and very fresh. The restaurant serves great food, which is beautifully presented. The Shore is right next to the Katathani Beach resort, and you can use its facilities for free. It has various restaurants, bars and swimming pools, and is also right on the beach. This must be one of the best hotel experiences of our lives - we cannot wait to go back. It's expensive, but for what it offers it is good value for money.
reviews.title: A perfect oasis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from an 8 night holiday in Phuket. We had booked an 8 night stay at The Katathani in a Junior Suite. This was lovely. We were offered an upgrade to a seaview pool villa at The Shore for the last two nights. At first we were hesitant about doing this, as we thought it was too much of a hassle. We decided to do it and are glad we did. It was absolutely amazing. I had tears in my eyes when entering the room it was so gorgeous. I am very fussy about accommodation and like to stay in 4 star or more. The Shore deserves a 5 star rating and if I could give it more, I would. Staff and service were great, food was beautiful (even cooked more bacon for me because I wanted it less crispy), room and facilities were gorgeous. The pool and view were amazing. We ended up spending more time in our room than we thought and it felt like we had been there longer than we had. We stayed in a villa higher up, too far to walk but a complimentary buggy was provided when required. It was very quiet and private (Swimming togs were not needed). You also have access to all the facilities at The Katathani. Kata Noi Beach was wonderful too, it is very quiet compared to Kata, Karon and Patong. If you want to experience these they are not far away. We hired a scooter down the road and parking space at The Shore was provided with 24hr security. We travelled in the rainy season and this was not an issue as it is so warm. Puzzled as to why there are negative reviews. THE PERFECT ROMANTIC GETAWAY!.
reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a villa with a ‘wow’ bathroom and a lovely bath with a nice view. The infinity pool was great and excellent access to the beach. There is a restaurant at the sister hotel which I recommend. The Italian the food was superb with great ambiance and exceptional staff!
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked to stay here for 10 nights while in Thailand, we came in "rainy season" but this wasn't even an issue. It was so humid and hot in the day, despite sporadic overcast spells and rain... it was still so hot. Everything was outstanding, the service, the staff, what they offered and all the advice. The breakfast is incredible and literally has everything you could wish for. The rooms are like individual villas- amazing space and beautiful clean decor. Its on a hillside, so if you stay at one of the higher villas, its difficult to walk up and down all th time, they offer cpmplementary shittle services by golf cart. The view from the rooms is beautiful. I would reccomend the rooms closer down the hill as its closer to the sea and the view of the beach will be better. It is about a 25min taxi drive to Patong. Its a quaint side of Kata and a short taxi trip to Kata beach is welcomed with many choices of restaurants. This is an excellent choice and you wont go wrong in anyway.
reviews.title: Tropical bliss!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just enjoyed the most wonderful 8 nights at the Shore. We wanted somewhere very special to celebrate our silver wedding anniversary and looked to Kata Noi beach as we had stayed there 23 years ago at the Kata Thani resort and had loved it then. We were very excited having booked the Shore but from the moment we arrived, the experience surpassed even our highest expectations. We were greeted by the excellent Manager Sabine who obviously runs a very happy and efficient team as every single member of staff were superb.
reviews.title: Just beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: i stayed for 6 nights in Aug2013, i stayed in a mountain view villa # 8857, i thought it wud be a disappointment compared to seaview villas (there was no availbility) i was proved wrong.
reviews.title: Perfect beach Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013
reviews.text: The location:
reviews.title: Glorious

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013
reviews.text: although alittle distant from the airport and the major attraction, but the private beach is perfect, the location is safe and private, perfect for a chill.
reviews.title: Worth every penny.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Desgin:
reviews.title: Just relax & enjoy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: villas are smartly designed, you won't change a thing, i am an interior designer and this villas are an easy A+.
reviews.title: Beyond Our Expectations, No Doubt Travellers' Choice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 23-30 December 2010, Sea view pool villa 8843.
reviews.title: A wonderful peacful stay with most amazing view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For once must say the overwhelming positive reviews are correct. Some of the criticism as well, but I definitely think this hotel is one of the best in Phuket (maybe not quite as other 5 star resorts but within the range). The Shore at Katathani is part of the giant Katathani hotel/resort (where I would NOT stay!) which occupies the whole Kata noi beach. The Shore is definitely the most stunning, intimate and luxurious part of the whole area. Our villa was high up the hill with a breathtaking and no obstructed view of Kata noi beach and the land area next to it. Villas are all separate, large and very well equipped. Large bedroom with sliding doors opening up to your own infinity pool. The most fantastic view over the sea from the comfortable bed. Large beautiful bathroom with bathtub and separate shower. Two washbasins and separate toilette. Plenty of wardrobe space in the corridor behind the bedroom. Large terrace with sofa group and a dining area. A sunken lounge situated next to the pool. Nice bathroom amenities. Villa fully equipped with Ipod dock, flat screen tv, DVD, safe etc. Plenty of complimentary water refilled every day. The staff is very service minded, helpful and friendly. An excellent gym and beautiful spa (which not overpriced). Main pool area down by the beach very nice with plenty of sun loungers. Complimentary water service by the pool, as well as cold towels. Staff came around couple times a day offering some nice and cold smoothies. Shower by the pool. Direct access to the beach. Kata noi beach is one of the best in Phuket. Nice sand and clear water.
reviews.title: just one word :perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Few negative points: Situation of villas facing almost directly north. We had no sun during whole day. There may be a couple of villas further down the hill, closer to the pool/beach, which will get a little sun during the day (doubt any sunset view), but we opted for the amazing view of our villa higher up instead. Area is pretty steep although you can take the stairs or call for a buggy. The included breakfast was plentiful and very good, but our other meals were not great with small portions and pretty expensive. Katathani hotel offers another 6 restaurant which never tried. For lunch used local restaurants on beach or on the streets behind the hotel which were much better. Dinner suggest to go out of Kata noi. The lighthouse bar not opened. No beach club or free sun loungers on the beach (although not very expensive). Couple of nights didn’t get any turn down service. As always in Thailand some communication problems due to the language barrier, but have got used to this. Also, bit surprised management was not very present. Met one person from management when checking out (should have been when we checked in!).
reviews.title: Nice holidays in a great - but little overpriced - hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, all in all, a wonderful stay at the Shore and would definitely return again.
reviews.title: Amazing Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beatiful view, fabolous room, cheerful staff. Everything was perfect...
reviews.title: We love The Shore

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic position, great pool and beautiful rooms but service and food quality leaves much to be desired. Our stay wasn't helped by a film crew occupying the resort for 2 days, but the Resort Manager, Sabina, responded well and understood our plight! The staff are just not experienced enough yet and speaking English can be a problem.
reviews.title: This hotel needs to live up to its hype!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: We wish Sabina, her staff and the hotel well but we were disappointed.
reviews.title: 5 stars prices 4 stars room 3 stars service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: With budget Air Asia flying the perfect Fri night departure Sun return flight to Hong Kong, this was my 5th weekend escape in Phuket this year.
reviews.title: another smashing get away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Of the 6 hotels during this year's trips ranging from Indigo Pearl at thb5502 per night ( incl tax) to Andara at usd807.16/ thb 24214. My conclusions for this year
reviews.title: The Perfect Beach Vacation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Indigo thb5502 cheapest well designed & most convenient to airport
reviews.title: Heaven on Earth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Shore for 9 nights and could have easily stayed another 9 nights. The view from the infinity pool on the balcony was amazing. The room was actually larger than it looks in the hotel's website pictures, and the service was exceptionally good.
reviews.title: Great Service, Views and Private Pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had originally booked into the Katathani's Junior Suites, however we changed to the Shore as we got a good deal on Expedia. It was well worth it when we arrived.
reviews.title: Perfect Getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked an airport transfer through the Shore for 1500 baht each way. The car was a new Toyota with comfortable leather seats. The driver provided bottles of water and cold towels which were appreciated after the 9 hr flight from Australia.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Kata!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived at the Shore's reception area, we were welcomed by staff and quickly taken to our room by Buggy. The rest of the check-in was completed in our room following a tour of the room. As it was our anniversary, I had arranged for a bouquet of roses for my wife - it was much larger than expected and The Shore had also given us a cake with Happy Anniversary written on it.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay in Phuket

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: The villa looked brand new and was well designed. The infinity pool on the balcony was much larger and deeper than expected - almost the size of many backyard pools in Australia. The lounge areas next to the pool were spacious and comfortable.
reviews.title: Sheer understated indulgence

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just stayed 6 nights with the wonderful people at The Shore. Not one thing was overlooked, we were left wanting nothing the entire time and found the small things like fresh flowers in the room each day, the room being made over twice a day and rides to our room in a driven buggy by staff at anytime night and day extraordinary. We have stayed in our fair share of 5 star resorts and this tops the list. Free WiFi, levels of English was excellent, cleanliness were stand out things. Location is perfect, very private and secluded with security at the gate but close enough to Patong for shopping and tours. Stay as you wish is a nice feature, we were able to pick the types of pillows, our daily room flowers, ipad selection, board games selection and in room breakfast before arriving. Special mention to Dae, Smart and Jai three staff who were always on hand to help us in any way. Well done guys easily worth the money, was the nicest hotel we seen in our week in Phuket and will definitely be back.
reviews.title: If you could rate it more than 5 star I would

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed for 2 weeks (05/07/2013 - 19/07/2013 Room 8871 - great and very private room) and I would say it was one of the most enjoyable experiences my wife and I have ever had (and we travel a lot / worldwide each year even though we review rarely). It was not cheap but we made the most of all The Shore had to offer and so I see it as value for money.
reviews.title: Expensive Yes but So Very Enjoyable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you want cookie cut hotels like Hiltons, Westins or Intercontinental then this is not it. The service is personal, the people are genuine and the experience is unforgettable.
reviews.title: Expensive, but extremely lovely room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was cleaned to perfection each day - another review I read indicated to the contrary which I find surprising and I suspect either unlikely or uncharitable to the room attendants. Little personal touches were added by them daily.
reviews.title: Good Resort with a Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: More towels then you ever needed, fresh flowers, fruit and more fresh water than we ever needed. A bucket of ice was ordered each afternoon for G&Ts on the balcony and they arrived within minutes and without any fuss or an open hand like many US hotels I have attended.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at The Shore at Katathani after reading the overwhelmingly large number of positive reviews here on TripAdvisor. I got 2 Seaview Pool Villas for 4 adults for 4 nights in August, which was in the middle of the low season. I figured that it would be the best time to go to Phuket without the huge throngs of tourists.
reviews.title: Its the little things that count ...
Nothing more to imagine
reviews.text: On the surface, The Shore is a beautiful establishment, with a very very big plus point going for it - the spectacular views of Kata Beach and the pristine waters of the Andaman Sea. It is breath-taking when you first enter the Villa perched on top of a hillside facing the smaller Kata Noi Beach area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately, as the price you pay is rather high for such an exclusive property, it is inevitable that you start getting "nit picky" about the little things, and they all add up after staying for a few days.
reviews.title: Top notch accommodations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First, the checking in - one of the Villas was not ready until almost 4:00pm. Not quite acceptable really. The standard of housekeeping was variable. On one of the days, the housekeeping was not done until the late afternoon, even though we had called the reception to request for the Villa to be cleaned in the morning. On other days, the housekeeping was ok. It rained on two of the days we were there and the housekeeping staff did not wipe clean the couches in the open area next to the pool.
reviews.title: Warm friendly staff - rare in Phuket

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On my last day in the Villa, I had the misfortune of seeing a cockroach run around in my Villa! Quite shocking and unfortunately, I could not catch it, so its probably still lurking in the Villa now. That was Villa number 8843.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with helpful staff

aka: The Shore At Katathani Hotel Kata Beach
description: A luxury beachfront pool villa resort on Kata Noi Beach in Phuket, Thailand. This adult only resort is a natural fusion of indoor and outdoor living where time has no meaning beyond the pleasure of every moment.
